title: Upgraded Units Available, Laundry Facility, Package Acceptance
posting_body: ['Huntington House’s plush, landscaped courtyards with two community pools, walking paths, sundecks, barbecues and picnic tables welcomes residents with the perfect environment to call “home”.', 'Each apartment offers spacious floor plans, beautiful views of the courtyards and private entry.', 'Located on Fort Street enjoy Huntington House’s neighborhood charm in the city.', 'We would love for you to come on by and see what Huntington House has to offer!', '-Upgraded Units Available', '-One $35 Application Fee Per Apartment, Not Per Person', '-Late Fee Forgiveness', '-Package Acceptance', '-Laundry Facility', '-Sparkling Clean Swimming Pool', '-Private Entrance', '-BBQ & Picnic Area', '-Additional Storage', '-No Security Deposit Required', '-Air Conditioned', '-Radiant Baseboard Heat', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', 'Pricing and availability is subject to change.']
